title: Bug 8443Wording in Compiler prefer page needs to be improved
description: Martin let's discuss how to improve the wording.From Greg: With respect to the preference page its problematic on several fronts it requires me to have to rebuild everything it is separate from the task view & thus does not work as your typical viewfilter worksthe page itself is unclear to a user. When a user first sees this preferencepage they are not sure what it actually means. This is probably fixed with somesimple text that says something like "What severity level do you want to assignto the following problems."
